Source.Name: python-notify2
Source.Summary: notify2 is a replacement for pynotify
Source.Description: notify2 is a replacement for pynotify which can be used from different GUI toolkits and from programs without a GUI. The API is largely the same as that of pynotify, but some less important parts are left out.

Package.Name: python-notify2
Package.Summary: notify2 is a replacement for pynotify
Package.Description: notify2 is a replacement for pynotify which can be used from different GUI toolkits and from programs without a GUI. The API is largely the same as that of pynotify, but some less important parts are left out.
